tasks.details: Conduct a thorough audit of the TutorMax codebase to identify all meta documentation and temporary files created during development. This includes implementation summaries, task completion notes, exploration documents, validation checklists, architecture analysis files, and demo scripts documentation. Remove these files while ensuring that essential user-facing documentation such as README.md, API documentation, and deployment guides remain intact. Create a comprehensive list of all removed files to maintain an audit trail. Coordinate with team members to ensure no critical information is lost during this cleanup process.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all non-essential meta documentation and temporary files have been removed by conducting a file system audit. Ensure that essential user-facing documentation is intact and accessible. Review the final list of removed files to confirm completeness and accuracy. Conduct a peer review to ensure no critical information was inadvertently deleted.
